content.description: Head up the red slabs in a south westerly direction following the path of least resistance.  A few class 3 moves may be encountered as you zigzag your way up.  You'll eventually pass a large hoodoo with a dark brown top before reaching a flat bushy spot and the final gentle white slope that leads to the summit. The moves are no harder than class 3, but some may prefer a rope due to the exposure.  Pass a few false summit blobs to reach the middle highpoint.  Return the same way to the jughandle arch for all descents.  See the main peak page for canyoneering descent options.
content.protection: no fixed anything, minimal to no pro placement opportunities
content.location: The final drainage mentioned on the approach deposits you at the base of the NE flank of South Guardian.
